sentence: The image shows a screenshot of a mobile news app from "14 WFIE," displaying the top stories.
sentence_cn: 该图为“14 WFIE”移动新闻应用程序的截图，其中显示的是头条新闻。

sentence: The weather is shown at 38 degrees with a cloud icon, indicating overcast conditions at 1:17 (the time is visible at the top).
sentence_cn: 天气显示为 38 度，带有云图标，表示 1:17 时为阴天（时间在顶部可见）。

sentence: The main story has an image of a person and a dog, with the headline: "Family reunited with dog after seven month disappearance," dated March 26, 2017, at 9:06 PM.
sentence_cn: 主线故事中有一张人和一只狗的图片，标题为“一家人与狗失踪七个月后重聚”，发布日期为 2017 年 3 月 26 日晚上 9 点 06 分。
words: Family reunited with dog after seven month disappearance,

sentence: 1. "Crews repair water main break in Evansville," at 9:12 PM.
sentence_cn: 1.“工作人员正在修复埃文斯维尔的水管破裂处”，晚上 9 点 12 分。
words: Crews repair water main break in Evansville,

sentence: 2. "Accused cab driver robber turns himself in," at 7:45 PM, with a small thumbnail image of a person's face.
sentence_cn: 2.“被控抢劫出租车司机自首”，晚上 7 点 45 分，并附有一张人脸的小缩略图。
words: Accused cab driver robber turns himself in,

sentence: 3. "14 News looks at local nightclub security," at 5:54 PM, featuring a small image of a yellow sign.
sentence_cn: 3.“14 News 关注当地夜总会安全”，下午 5:54，显示一张黄色标志的小图像。
words: 14 News looks at local nightclub security,

sentence: At the bottom, part of an advertisement from Ashley Furniture is visible, offering "LOWEST PRICES of the season event" and "36 MONTHS NO INTEREST!"
sentence_cn: 在底部，可以看到 Ashley Furniture 的部分广告，其中显示“本季活动最低价”和“36 个月免息！”
words: LOWEST PRICES of the season event
